code: import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faCheck,faBell}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'./NotificationsList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotificationsList=_ref=>{let{notifications,markNotificationAsRead}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notifications-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faBell})," Notifications"]}),notifications.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No notifications to display"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"notifications-list",children:notifications.map(notification=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:`notification ${notification.notification_type} ${notification.is_read?'read':'unread'}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:notification.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:notification.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:new Date(notification.created_at).toLocaleString()})]}),!notification.is_read&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-icon",onClick:()=>markNotificationAsRead(notification.id),title:"Mark as read",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faCheck})})]},notification.id))})]});};export default NotificationsList;
